For everyone getting the storm.dll file error, you are trying to use the crack with the wrong version/patch.

Reinstall the game. Go to blizzard's website, and follow along until you find the old patches section. Scroll down until you find "120b English" or w/e language you use. That is the only patch that the crack will work with, so far as I know.

This is a solution How to get rid of storm.dll problem.
1. Install game  
2. Go to http://ftp.blizzard.com/pub/war3/patches/pc/
and download 1.20e patch for your language version. Use it file name is War3ROC_120e_English
3. Go to "http://www.gameburnworld.com/dl/dl.php?file=Warcraft3ReignOfChaosv1.20eANDWarcraft3TheFrozenThrone1.20eBNetLoaderNoCDLoaderAll.zip" download no cd crack 
use Winrar to extract all the files straight into the Warcraft directory.
You schould have 1 folder and war3.exe file to replace oryginal one. If U have done properly point 1 and 2 u have nothing to worry about. Replace war3.exe with cracked one , run the game and enjoy. If something has gone wrong You must uninstall game delete all warcraft folder content and install again. To prevent this move before aplaying 1.20e path backup war3.exe and storm.dll from fresh not cracked yet instalation if you still expierancing a  problem with storm.dll just replace fresh cracked dll and war3.exe file with backuped ones do point 1 and 2 . But it wont be needed because all is ok just use apropriate files . Thanks i hope it helps a bit.

Installing and Cracking Warcraft III + Frozen Throne For Dummies:

1. Install Warcraft III. "Warcraft III - The Frozen Throne [Disk 1].iso.iso"

2. Download Original Warcraft III Update Version 1.20e from http://ftp.blizzard.com/pub/war3/patches/pc/.

3. Install the Update. MAKE SURE IT'S 1.20e!

4. Install Warcraft III Frozen Throne." Warcraft III - The Frozen Throne [Disk2].iso"

5. Download Warcraft III Frozen Throne Update Version 1.20e from http://ftp.blizzard.com/pub/war3x/patches/pc/.

6. Install the Update. MAKE SURE IT'S 1.20e!

7. Download the Crack for both Warcraft III and Frozen Throne from http://www.gameburnworld.com/dl/dl.php?file=Warcraft3ReignOfChaosv1.20eANDWarcraft3TheFrozenThrone1.20eBNetLoaderNoCDLoaderAll.zip.

8. Open the .zip file with WinZip or WinRar or your favourite utility and extract everything to your Warcraft III folder that contains "Warcraft III.exe," "Frozen Throne.exe," and "World Editor.exe." If it asks for confirmation to overwrite, do so, or backup those three files if you want, then overwrite.

9. Done! Play both games if you want. Both are cracked, and version 1.20e. No crack exists for version 1.21e now, so don't download version 1.21e for either of them. It just won't work.

Hi, orange 29, I haven't downloaded the torrent yet and I'm not that good with this kind of stuff. But from my experience, if it says there's no cd, it's either because you have to mount it on a cd before instaling, or because you have to patch a crack on the game. Now I don't know yet if there is a crack attached in the file, but if there is, that would be it, if not, then try mounting it directly on cds, if that does not work either, I'm afraid I don't know. Good luck.
